scam_examples.text: I have an investment opportunity with guaranteed high returns. You just need to pay a small fee upfront to participate.
Congratulations, you’ve won a prize! Please provide your bank account details to receive the winnings.
There is a security issue with your account. Please click this link and enter your username and password to verify your identity.
We need to verify your identity. Please send us your ID number and date of birth.
This is a limited-time offer. If you don’t decide today, you’ll miss this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity.
I can help you earn huge returns in the cryptocurrency market. You just need to invest some funds first.
Buy some gift cards for me, and I’ll pay you back immediately. It’s an emergency.
We have a high-paying work-from-home position. You only need to pay a training fee upfront.
I’m in an emergency situation abroad and need money. Please transfer some funds; I’ll pay you back as soon as possible.
We detected a virus on your device. Please download this software immediately and pay a removal fee.
Limited-time sale: only 3 items left. Click this link and pay via bank transfer.
This is a notice from the tax office. You have unpaid taxes. Please reply immediately with your bank details to avoid fines.
